text:
Hello,

Currently mod_auth_digests creates a authdigest_shm.1 in /usr/local/apache2/logs/ . As I am running a docker container, the root filesystem should be read-only. I can not specify the location of this file in any way apparently.

Corresponding ServerFault post: https://serverfault.com/questions/776095/apache-shared-memory-for-mod-digest-on-read-only-docker-container

Is this a static reference of some sorts?
creator: hazcod@outlook.be
hazcod@outlook.be
text: Setting DefaultRuntimeDir fixed it, thanks to @Federico Sierra at ServerFault!
